text: Indiana's 7th congressional district is a congressional district in the U.S. state of Indiana. The district is in Marion County and includes most of Indianapolis. The district used to have more Republicans in the district but now is mostly Democratic Party. The people who live in the district elect a person to represent the district in the United States House of Representatives. The district is currently represented by Democrat Andr√© Carson, who won a special election in 2008 to replace his grandmother Julia Carson after she died in 2007. ==Election history== Year Office Result 2000 President Al Gore 56 - George W. Bush 43% 2004 President John Kerry 58 - George W.
